EpiViz: Circos plots for epidemiologists

EpiViz is an R package and Web application designed to streamline and enable the efficient creation of Circos plots for epidemiological data.

Circular layouts provide a unique way to visualize large amounts of information, allowing researchers to observe patterns across multiple categories and datasets simultaneously.
